mapper.select: SELECT `language`.language_name, `language`.thumbnail_image_url, course.course_name, course.course_intro, course.price, course.discount_price, course.certificate_or_not, course.id FROM lt_course `course` JOIN lt_language `language` ON course.language_id = `language`.id WHERE course.hot_or_not = 'yes'

SELECT `language`.language_name languageName, course.thumbnail_image_url courseThumbnail, course.course_name,course.course_intro, course.course_lightspot,course.purchase_notes, course.certificate_or_not certificateOrNot,course.certificate_title certificateTitle, course.certificate_image_url certificateImageUrl, course.price coursePrice,course.discount_price courseDiscountPrice, course.id courseId FROM lt_course `course` LEFT JOIN lt_language `language` ON course.language_id = `language`.id WHERE course.`status` = 'putaway' AND course.id = #{id}
SELECT `level`.level_name levelName,`level`.id levelId FROM lt_level `level` LEFT JOIN lt_course `course` ON course.id = `level`.course_id WHERE course.`status` = 'putaway' AND course.id = #{id}

SELECT `language`.language_name languageName,course.course_name courseName, course.course_intro courseIntro,course.thumbnail_image_url courseThumbnail, course.certificate_or_not certificateOrNot,course.id courseId FROM lt_course `course` LEFT JOIN lt_language `language` ON course.language_id = `language`.id
course.`status`='putaway' AND `language`.`status`='putaway'
AND `language`.language_name LIKE '%${languageName}%' OR course.course_name LIKE '%${languageName}%'
SELECT lc.id courseId,lc.course_name FROM lt_course lc WHERE lc.hot_or_not = 'yes' AND lc.`status` = 'putaway'
SELECT co.id courseId,co.certificate_or_not certificateOrNot FROM lt_course co LEFT JOIN lt_language la ON co.language_id = la.id WHERE la.id = #{languageId}

select co.id,co.course_name,course_validity_period,co.price,co.discount_price,co.discount_start_time,co.discount_end_time from lt_course co left join lt_language la on co.language_id = la.id where la.id = #{languageId}
select id,course_name,course_validity_period,price,discount_price, discount_start_time as discountStartTime, discount_end_time as discountEndTime from lt_course where id=#{id}
